short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you earn cash back when you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SavingsWatch SavingsAlert is free and helps you earn cash back for purchases at stores you know and trust. You pay exactly the same as you would normally shopping online but also receive an additional cash back from SavingsWatch.

Quick & Easy installation. Start Saving!

1. Install SavingsWatch SavingsAlert to begin. 

2. Shop online at hundreds of merchant sites or through SavingsWatch.com

3. SavingsWatch SavingsAlert extension reminds you about store cash back when you shop online. Then Savings Watch mails your qualified rebate check monthly.

Read the  SavingsWatch SavingsAlert End User License agreement: 
http://offers.incentivenetworks.com/webapp/eula.html

Privacy Policy:
https://www.privacycookienotice.com/privacy/privacy_notice.pdf

Made by Incentive Networks. Visit us at www.incentivenetworks.com
